sentence.Network_en: Materials which have magnetic properties similar to iron are ferromagnetic.
sentence.Network_cn: 具有类似于铁那样的磁性的材料就是铁磁物质.

sentence.Network_en: A number of rather exotic ferromagnetic materials have been studied to this end.
sentence.Network_cn: 为此,研究了许多颇为奇特的铁磁材料.

sentence.Network_en: It is sometimes difficult to draw the line separating ferromagnetic from paramagnetic substances.
sentence.Network_cn: 严格区别铁磁性与顺磁性物质有时是很困难的.
